results.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL documentation landing page - Azure Database for PostgreSQL
results.description: Azure Database for PostgreSQL documentation Azure Database for PostgreSQL is a fully managed, AI-ready Database-as-a-Service (DBaaS) offering built on the open-source PostgreSQL engine, designed to support mission-critical workloads with predictable performance, robust security, high availability, and seamless scalability.
